docs.lead_paragraph: A paragraph elsewhere in this paper speaks of the ravages of Cholera on board the ship Sagadahac, bound from Gottenberg to Boston, and fallen in with at sea by the packet Havre, which reached this port yesterday. The fast suggesting inquiry as to the state of affairs at our Quarantine, we made investigation to that end, yesterday.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; THE HENRY CLAY CATASTROPHE. Trial of the Owners and Officers of the Henry Clay. UNITED STATES CIRCUIT COURT. Before lion, Judge Ingersoll. German Meetings. EPISCOPAL CONVENTION. Triennial Convention of the Protestant Episcopal Church. Collision between Steamer Utica and Sloop Jane Grant. Board of Supervisors. NEW-YORK O. S. PRESBYTERIAN SYNOD. A BACKWOODSMAN FLEECED. UNNATURAL CONDUCT. TRIAL OF THE NEW ORGAN IN ST. GEORGE'S CHURCH.

docs.lead_paragraph: FIRST DAY. The People of the Unite! States against Thomas Collyer, John F. Tallman, John German, Edward Hubbard, James L. Jessup, James Elmendorf and Charles Merritt. This long pending case has at last come in a palpable shape before the public, and probably in the course of the next fortnight the arguments and evidence will have been concluded, and the verdict rendered by the Jury.

headline.main: Lieut. Maury and the Liverpool Shipowners.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following correspondence is published in the Liverpool Papers: To Liecut. Maury, ??.S.N., , SIR: I have been directed by the committee of the Liverpool Shipoweners' Assoication, at a special meeting called for this object, to express to you their high appreciation of your talents, and the indefatigable labors and researches so remarkably evinced in the splended charts of the winds and currents.

headline.main: A Blossom from Boston Four Corners.

docs.lead_paragraph: In our issue of Saturday we called attention to the disgraceful breach of the peace which occurred at Boston Four Corners on the preceding Thursday. Our comments, necessarily severe, were in good time.
docs.snippet: In our issue of Saturday we called attention to the disgraceful breach of the peace which occurred at Boston Four Corners on the preceding Thursday. Our comments, necessarily severe, were in good time.

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE ATLANTIC. HIGHLY IMPORTANT. WAR DECLARED BY TURKEY Rumored Hostilities. FALL IN THE FUNDS. THE OLMUTZ CONFERENCE. Kossta Released--His Departure for the United States. DEATH OF M ARAOO. Letter from Kossuth on Eastern Affairs. War between Gen. J. Watson Webb and the London Times. Interesting Intelligence from the Continent. CHOLERA ON SHIPBOARD AT LIVERPOOL. CONTINUED DULLNESS IN COTTON. No Decided Change in Grain Markets. THE EASTERN QUESTION. Latest Intelligence--Rumored Declaration of War. Kossath on the Eastern Question. GREAT BRITAIN. The Recent Equinoctial Gales. OUTBREAK OF HOSTILITIES. General J. Watson Webb and the London Times. The London Press on the Eastern Question. Reply of the London Times. Wreck of the Isaac Wright, Emigrant Ship. FRANCE. France Reproves England for Indecision--New Decrees relative to Breadstuffs--Statistics of the Food Market--Mexican Debt to France--Rate of Interest--Various Items. SPAIN. Various Interesting Items. GERMANY. The Protestant Conference. PRUSSIA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U. S. Mail steamship Atlantic, from Liverpool Wednesday, Oct., 5, at 1 o'clock P. M., with 210 passengers, , reached this port yesterday at 12 M. The Asia arrived at Liverpool at 10 o'clock forenoon of Sunday, 2d. On 28th ult., lat. 50??.46, lon. 28??.26 passed the Arabia from New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the New-York Medical Times for October, Dr. JOHN WATSON has some clinical observations on the surgical diseases of childhood, from which several points are deduced: First, that injury to the limbs of the young is apt to lead to arrested development, causing lameness; and second, to severe inflammation around the spongy heads of bones and separation of the cartilaginous
